entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mechanic.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_60: I've got important business to take care of here. Find someone else to interview.
entries.s_73: What is this?  Do you actually have the spare parts we need? Well, I guess we all owe you our lives.
entries.s_96: Will you be able to fix the shuttle?
entries.s_97: I'm going to get this thing up in the air...even if that means me throwing it.  Now move along. I have a lot of work to do.
